td.content: s:patient presents with 2 years history of moderate dyspepsia. pt also reports increased frequency of moderate epigastric pain, moderate abdominal pain, Stomach. patient is a white male aged 52 ys. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 71 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness, HEENT: WNL, all lung fields a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

td.content: s:pt describes moderate epigastric pain, moderate abdominal pain and moderate dyspepsia. he is a white M aged 52 yrs. o:Height 72 in, Weight 210 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness, HEENT: WNL, all lung fields a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Endoscopic therapy (Hemoclip) - stomach.

td.content: s:patient presents with mild epigastric pain. pt is a 53 yr old male. he denies drinking alcohol he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 71 in, Weight 205 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed NEXIUM - 40 mg daily, and ordered Urea breath test.
